title: "Luria"
---


* I am a second year PhD student in Biological and Environmental Engineering at Cornell University.
* I am a Cornell Fellowship recipient. 
* I graduated *cum laude* with a BS in Biological Engineering from the College of Engineering at Cornell University in May 2019. 
* I have broad research interests in water resources, ecohydrology, sustainable systems, climate change and bioenvironmental challenges in rural and low-resource areas.
